title: CNH Generator
description: Generate valid CNH (Brazilian Driver's License) numbers for testing and development purposes.

form.stateHelp: Choose the state to generate the CNH

about.title: About CNH Generator
about.description: This tool generates valid CNH numbers following the official Brazilian algorithm. The generated numbers are mathematically valid and can be used for testing and development, but should not be used for fraudulent purposes.

tips.title: Usage Tips
tips.testOnly: Use only for testing and development

note.title: Important
note.content: Generated numbers are mathematically valid but are for testing purposes only. Do not use for fraudulent or illegal activities.
